title: The FBI Is Harvesting Faces But President Pence Scares Us More 10.25.17
itunes:title: The FBI Is Harvesting Faces But President Pence Scares Us More 10.25.17
description:
In episode 13, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Dana Gould to discuss Mike Pence & his delusions, Bill O'Reilly's new excuses, facial recognition software, & a call in from our New York correspondent Taylor Ortega about the 'good' television show.
